Loading the Matlab software array:
```{r message=FALSE}
library(R.matlab)

# read the Matlab array
yeast.mat <- readMat("../data/yeast.mat", fixNames = TRUE)
```


Names of the Matlab objects:
```{r}
names(yeast.mat)
```

Get the `data` part of the Matlab array file:
```{r}
data <- yeast.mat$data
```

Get the dimensions and assign:
```{r}
n <- nrow(data)
p <- ncol(data)
```


## center the data

```{r}
colSums(data) / n
```

```{r}
source("../matlab.R")
```


```{r}
r <- repmat(colSums(data)/n, n, 1)
```


```{r}
repmat2 = function(X, m, n) {
##R equivalent of repmat (matlab)
mx = dim(X)[1]
nx = dim(X)[2]
matrix(t(matrix(X,mx,nx*n)),mx*m,nx*n,byrow=T)
}
```

r <- repmat(A, 2, 3)
